demolition

Class Explosion

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.Explosion

  • public class Explosion
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the explosion event in the demolition game.Explosion lasts for 2 seconds and spans up to 2 spaces further from where bomb was located both vertially and horizontally. However, Explosion does not destroy solid wall or empty tile. It can destroy enemy, player and broken walls.

      • addExplosionSprites

        public void addExplosionSprites(PApplet pApplet)

        Loads all the explosion sprites from the file system and stores it in a map container using direction as key and sprite as value.

        Parameters:
        pApplet - is the instance of App in order to get access to loadImage method from PApplet

      • explode

        public void explode(App app)

        Begins explosion. Explosion can expand upto 4 cardianal spaces i.e 2 vertically if there is no wall and 2 horizontally same as vertical expansion.

        Parameters:
        app - is an instance of App in order to render the explosion

      • canExplodeInCoord

        public boolean canExplodeInCoord(java.lang.Integer[] coord,
                                 java.lang.String[][] grid)

        Helper method to determine if the bomb can explode in the given coord.

        Parameters:
        coord - is the neighbour coordinate upto 2 spaces further apart from the bomb location
        grid - presents the 2D String array from the txt file
        Returns:
        true if it can explode in given coord

      • detetectPlayersAndBrokenWalls

        public boolean detetectPlayersAndBrokenWalls(java.lang.Integer[] coord,
                                             java.lang.String[][] grid,
                                             App app)
        Helper method for to determine if player, enemy or broken wall exists within the radius of bomb explosion.
        Parameters:
        coord - is the neighbour cooridnate from the bomb location
        grid - is the 2D String array representing the game map
        app - is an instance of App
        Returns:
        true if broken wall or player or enemy are detected in the given coord.
